items.title: Nvidia's RTX 6000D aims to restore lost ground in China

items.title: Babydoll Archi’s secret unveiled: She’s neither a content influencer nor living in US. Who is she?
items.summary: An Instagram account, 'Babydoll Archi,' amassed 1.4 million followers using AI-generated content featuring a fabricated woman. Assam police arrested Pratim Bora, the ex-partner of the woman whose image was exploited, for creating the fake profile.
